objects.text:
• Spacious & Stylish Design
• Premium Faux Leather
• Gold-Tone Hardware
• Multiple Compartments

product_details.description: ALDO womens Durable handbag This spaciously stylish tote bag boasts ample storage space and shoulder strap for extra utility Made of synthetic materials 1 compartment: stylish and functional to store your cell phone, wallet, or any other essential you need near by Medium: the perfect medium sized handbag for everyday life Size: 10.9'' L x 4'' W x 12.4'' H (28cm x 10.5cm x 32cm) Fabric type - Faux Leather ** Origin - Imported ** Closure type - Zipper ** Lining - Synthetic ** Country of Origin - Cambodia **

banner_details:
This banner features a clean and elegant design, ideal for promoting a luxury tote bag. The layout is visually balanced with the product image ("product_image") prominently displayed on the right side and several text objects on the left for clarity and impact. The heading ("heading") is bold and capitalized, using a deep brown shade, while the subheading ("subheading") underneath adds flair in a strong golden hue with a serif font. The descriptive bullet points ("description") use a smaller, clean typeface to highlight features. The price ("price") is large and eye-catching in the same brown palette. A rounded rectangular call-to-action button ("cta_background") contains the contrasting white "SHOP NOW" text ("cta"). Background elements like circles, overlays, and soft gradients enhance the premium feel.

**Color Palette:**
- Background: #F9F2EA (ivory)
- Primary Text: #8B5A2B (chocolate brown)
- Accent Text: #B8860B (rich gold)
- Description Text: #5D4037 (deep taupe)
- CTA Button: #8B5A2B with White Text
- Decorative Shapes: #D4B996, #C89D7C (warm beige tones)
product_color: The product image showcases a sophisticated and stylish handbag in a warm caramel brown tone, blending elegance with simplicity. The primary color, a muted camel brown (#B47E64), gives the product a rich, luxurious appeal. Accents in polished gold (#D4AF37) on the hardware, charms, and logo add contrast and highlight the product’s premium quality. The texture provides subtle visual depth without overpowering the overall design. For an advertisement banner, a color palette featuring camel brown (#B47E64), gold (#D4AF37), soft beige (#F5EBDD), and charcoal gray (#3C3C3C) can be used to emphasize class, sophistication, and timeless fashion. These colors blend harmoniously while allowing the gold to shine.
